root.name: Artura
root.description: Stand proud Artura, son of Pendragon as you use the mystical wheel of Cerriddwen to travel to the stronghold of your evil half-sister, Morgause to rescue Nimue. Overcome ghouls, spiders, soldiers and giant rats whilst finding the mystical tune stones which will help your quest. An arcade adventure set in the 5th century when bloody wars and mysterious magic made every day a tireless adventure.
